content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for this apartment in Duisburg, I have an initial figure in mind. However, I'm open to negotiating for the best possible outcome. Let's see where our discussions lead. Please propose a price that you find suitable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your openness during the negotiation, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's location and features, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, Maryam. However, I must strive to obtain the highest price possible for this apartment. With that in mind, I cannot agree to 550 Euros at this time. I suggest we consider a price closer to 600 Euros per month. Please let me know if you find this more acceptable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position but as a careful spender, 600 Euros seems higher than my budget limit for this apartment. I would like to explore other options or request a slight reduction to around 575 Euros a month. If both parties agree on this price or cannot find common ground, I will reevaluate my choices.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I acknowledge your financial considerations, Maryam. While I still aim to maximize my returns, I'm willing to make a compromise in this case. Let us agree on a rental price of 575 Euros per month for this apartment. If you find this satisfactory, I say 'I agree to the price of 575 Euro!' to finalize the negotiation. Otherwise, please continue with your concerns or alternative preferences.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 575 Euro! Thank you for your understanding and flexibility during the negotiation process, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to discussing additional details regarding the lease and moving in. Have a great day.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
